thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Amplifon Q1 Net Profit Up 19.3 Pct At EUR 15.2 Mln On Comparable Basis

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Amplifon Q1 Net Profit Up 19.3 Pct At EUR 15.2 Mln On Comparable Basis
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Amplifon SpA:
* Q1 REVENUE EUR 310.3 MILLION VERSUS EUR 296.1 MILLION YEAR AGO ON COMPARABLE BASIS
* Q1 NET PROFIT EUR 15.2 MILLION VERSUS EUR 12.8 MILLION YEAR AGO ON COMPARABLE BASIS
* FOR REST OF 2018, IT EXPECTS FAVORABLE TREND IN REVENUES TO CONTINUE, OUTPACING MARKET
* FOR 2018, IT EXPECTS PROFITABILITY TO INCREASE WITH RESPECT TO PRIOR YEAR
* Q1 NET REVENUES (IFRS 2018) EUR 309.4 MILLION * Q1 NET PROFIT (IFRS 2018) EUR 14.6 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
